General.Name: ACV Auctions Inc
General.Description: ACV Auctions Inc. operates a digital marketplace that connects buyers and sellers for the online auction of wholesale vehicles. The company provides data services insights into the condition and value of used vehicles, as well as customer financing services. ACV Auctions Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Buffalo, New York.
General.Address: 640 Ellicott Street, Buffalo, NY, United States, 14203
